1:
Circulars for website(Cicular) 
RESTRICTED 
 
NO.CAS-8(1)/2004/Div.I  
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING , JANPATH BHAWAN   
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Date: 24/11/2008 
 
CIRCULAR No. 13/2008 
 
SUBJECT:- ACCESS OF VEHICLES UPTO THE AIRCRAFT AT CIVIL 
AIRPORTS IN THE COUNTRY ON PROTOCOL / SECURITY / 
MEDICAL GROUNDS. 
 
 
Reference BCAS Circular No. 36/2005 dated 30/08/2005 on the subject cited 
above. 
 
2. 
Shri Ghulam Nabi Azad, former Chief Minister of Jammu & Kashmir is permitted 
to avail facility of Airport Operator’s ferry vehicle up to the aircraft, during his 
departure/arrival by air from/to IGI Airport Delhi, on grounds of security. 
 
3. 
Shri Ghulam Nabi Azad, former Chief Minister of Jammu & Kashmir is permitted 
to  avail facility of his own vehicle up to the tarmac area during his 
departure/arrival by air from/to Srinagar and Jammu Airports, on the grounds of 
security. 
 
4. 
This supersedes BCAS Circular No. 7/2008 dated 03/09/2008 and will 
remain in force till further order. 
 
 
 
(D.S.Chauhan) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
 
Distribution as per list attached/overleaf. 
 
Copy to :  
1. MCA(Shri Gowri Shankar, U/Secretary), RG Bhavan, New Delhi 
2. MHA (Shri D. K Kotia, JS(PM), Jaisalmer House, 26,Mansingh Road,    
New Delhi, w.r.t D.O No. VI.23018/7/2005-VS dated 09/09/08.
